trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Alpharetta
There were no other sightings in Alpharetta on or around January 27th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsOn overcast dusk evening standing on my back deck, I observe a bright emerald colored sphere shape drop through cloud cover about 600 feet, then level off and and in 1 second was gone from sight. Object flew on level path and appeared to have a green vapor trail about 8-10 feet long behind it as it sped off.
Summary: Emerald colored sphere drops through cloud then shoots straight East
